name: The Legendary of Bean
description:
Storyline:

The Cadiaden Empire and the Titeserret Kingdom were at war.

A mercenaries, Kaim! He is going to The Cadiaden Empire with His companion. On the way, they met a girl. She is the princess of the Titeserret Kingdom. So they took the job of escort her back to Titeserret.



Features:

  • Team is composed of 3 characters
  • Over 30 different monsters to fight, each with their own strengths, and modifiers for them as well for even more variety.
  • High-quality maps, monsters and graphics, along with a lush music score enhance the experience
  • Exciting story full of twists and witty or hilarious dialogs
  • Lovable, addicting characters
